to_address:
Sugar List <sugar@laptop.org>, "OLPC Developer's List" <devel@laptop.org>,
   etoys@laptop.org, security@laptop.org,
   Marco Pessenti-Gritti <mpg@redhat.com>, Dan Williams <dcbw@redhat.com>,
   Chris Blizzard <blizzard@redhat.com>
subject: [sugar] Open telephone call for activity developers....
body:
Trial-2 is approaching, as you all know.

We'd like to have a phone call to lay out what's happening, when you can
expect things to happen, and ask questions so you'll be better prepared
to take advantage of the new presence and tubes facilities that will be
integrated very shortly.

I'd like to suggest 12 noon, EDT, Boston time, Friday, June 22.
http://www.timeanddate.com/worldclock/fixedtime.html?month=6&day=22&year=2007&hour=12&min=0&sec=0&p1=43


DIAL IN:
   From  the United States: 866-213-2185
   From Outside the United States:  1-609-454-9914

access code: 8069698

problems? Call customer care
800-526-2655 or 205-206-2301

Agenda:
 Schedule
 Journal
 Collaboration
 Localization

                                        Best Regards,
                                             - Jim Gettys

-- 
Jim Gettys
One Laptop Per Child
